content.rendered:
In this volume, we consider the subject of preservation.

We visit the Goetheanum in Switzerland, and rediscover the work of Auguste Rodin and the designs of Hvidt & Mølgaard. We tour the collections of Sir John Soane’s Museum and the Oxford Botanic Garden, and contemplate memory and identity.

excerpt.rendered: In this volume, we consider the subject of preservation. We visit the Goetheanum in Switzerland, and rediscover the work of Auguste Rodin and the designs of Hvidt & Mølgaard. We tour the collections of Sir John Soane’s Museum and the Oxford Botanic Garden, and contemplate memory and identity.
